header.heading: 6'1" combo guard focused on pace, decision-making, and on-ball defense.
header.subheading: Current teams: Blue Valley Southwest • YouHoop 3SSB Gold
header.supportingText: Focused on becoming the best I can be

training.focusAreas:
Off-Season Focus Areas
Ball handling under pressure and pick-and-roll reads
Catch-and-shoot 3s and off-the-dribble shooting
On-ball defense and strength
training.routine:
### Training Routine

* Skill sessions: \[X] days per week with \[Trainer/Coach Name]
* Weight room: \[X] days per week focused on strength and mobility
* Film study: breaking down our games and college guards I want to emulate
training.statement: I'm always working to become a more complete guard – someone who can run a team, guard multiple positions, and make teammates better.
